title: Historical (Walawwa with 7 Acres) House and Land for Sale
details:
Over 2 hundred years old house for sale in Sabaragamuwa Province.
Size of land area - 4 Acres
Size of paddy field area 3 - Acres
Two well with pump motor and big 2 water tanks
Three phase electricity with Generator.
Indoor and outdoor gardens.
Well maintained house and land.
Furniture and some historical items are available (Condition apply)
This is a highly residential area with all facilities.
This deal is open for the local or foreign buyer if interested.

We are not providing more images with this advertisement but if you wish to buy this property, Please contact any time.
No brokers please.
Suneth / Chaminda
0768288505 / 0714260600
